title: [Feature Request]: Allow packaging framework-dependent apps into an MSIX package
body:
### Summary

Currently, it's not possible to package framework-dependent apps into an MSIX package. With a switch to set self-contained to be false, we could have MSIX packages with applications that are framework-dependent.

### Background and Motivation

I'm using a Bootstrapper which combines the advantages of self-contained and framework-dependent deployment (for context, see [here](https://github.com/Tyrrrz/DotnetRuntimeBootstrapper)). Currently, I cannot use that bootstrapper for applications that I package with MSIX.

### Proposed Feature

Add a switch to set self-contained to be false when packaging an app into an MSIX package.

### Alternative Designs

_No response_

nodes.body: Hi @CanePlayz - how are you currently creating MSIX packages? Is this through something like a `wapproj` is Visual Studio, or some other means?
